tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I came across Dr. Teji Dawane's profile through Practo while looking for general consultation. Reading through the same, I went to her for prenatal consultation. She is extremely humble and polite. She explains everything required in great detail and I felt good and positive post consultation.I told her my reservations about having a C-section and how I am committed for Normal Delivery. She helped a great deal in explaining the required diet, exercises and lifestyle. She doesn't recommend unnecessary tests or examinations. My husband also felt very realistic and positive about my and baby's health during all consultations.In second trimester, my sugar level came a bit higher than normal and she guided me through the lifestyle to reduce it to normal level in just about a month.All Thanks to Dr. Teji for being there through my pregnancy and rushing to Hospital on a short notice when I got admitted to hospital. I sailed through the Labor for NVD and delivered a healthy baby girl this Decemeber.I strongly recommend Dr. Teji to all women for pregnancy consultations.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** **** ****** ** **** **** **** ** *** ******* We came to her with many delivery complications and she treated us very nicely.  She is very polite.. Humble.. And truely professional person. We were getting treated in Manipal from her but due to some reason she left Manipal and joined Cloudnine Whitefield... Our relationship was so strong that we also came to Cloudnine during last months of pregnancy. We were very scared about delivery but with her tremendous support, love and care we are blessed with a Baby boy now... She is amazing... Best doctor of this era and this universe.. She is the best human being.... Words can not justify her support, love and care.5 billions of ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ for her.We love and respect you A Lot... Our favourite Teji Mam!!Regards,Amar ( Patient Neelam Husband)Cloudnine Hospital WhitefieldD O Delivery - 2 Aug 2021

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Teji is extremely caring, friendly *** ************** She spends a lot of time in not just explaining the process at every step of pregnancy but also spends time in knowing you personally, counsels you, reassures you if something is bothering. 
The best Ob-Gyn I have ever come across. She is always warm and welcoming... One needs a doctor like her by their side during pregnancy . You are in the best hands if you go to her.She never unnecessarily prescribes any tests or medicines. Thanks a ton Dr. Teji for always being there! I have always felt at so much ease all through my pregnancy knowing you have it all in control!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We had consulted Teji during my wife's second pregnancy in 37th week .
She thoroughly checked my wife's records during our first visit, and gave very good guidance and explained each point in scans.
She is a very down to earth person. My wife's first pregnancy is normal, we requested the same during the second one.
We had asked multiple questions about Normal delivery. She had answered all our queries and helped us for Normal Delivery.
During Delivery day,it was Sunday. She started responding to our queries early in the morning and was available during pregnancy time.
All my Family members are happy with her treatment.
 
I will highly recommend teji to others

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: We consulted during second week of pregnancy for checkup. *** *** ********* ** *** ********** When we consulted for first time my wife had no blood discharge. Doctor examined and said everything is fine. Next day wife got some pain and very little blood discharge. we rushed to doctor next day, again doctor examined and said everything is fine, don't worry. Based on our first child experience we asked doctor for some medication for this situation then doctor gives one injection. We came back assured. Next day again both the blooding and pain increases. We contacted doctor on Whatsapp *** ******* ********* she tell us may be it's miscarriage. When we tried to ask her what should we do now she stopped responding. We reached hospital in the evening *** ***** ******* ** ********* ** ***** ******* ***** *** *** ****** **** ** ***** ***** ** **** *** ***** *** **** ** **** *** ******** ******** ** *** ***** We are going to consult another doctor to understand what could be the reason for miscarriage and what to do after this.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We have been very amazing experience with Dr Teji Dawane for both my wife and sister. We went for pregnancy checkup and baby delivery, she is very well experienced in genic and obstetrician. Very friendly, explained thoroughly each problem to us.  She will give you enough time to discuss with patient, also self-possessed if patient is anxious. 

She never prescribed unnecessary test and medicines. Dr Teji mostly preferred for normal delivery. For my sister she waited for 12 hr long for normal delivery.
I will be highly recommend to Dr Teji if you have any pregnancy  issue in Bangalore. Going forward I will continue visiting to her. 

A big thanks to Dr Teji :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This is for all the ladies who are planning a baby or are already carrying one. Happened to have delivered a baby recently under the guidance of Dr. Teji Dawane. * *** *** **** *** ** *** ** *** **** ********************** * **** **** **** I have had such a peaceful and relaxed delivery and the overall experience was amazing. In the recent scenario of Covid-19 the way Dr. Teji had responded to my endless queries, given me the best suggestions and kept me happy throughout the journey, I would recommend her to all expecting ladies! She is soft spoken, humble, caring, and a very beautiful human being. There is such an optimistic vibe in her personality which can make an expecting mother feel extremely confident about herself. I couldn't have had a better gynaecologist than her! Thank you very much Dr. Teji ma'am for you constant support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Labor and Delivery,
review: ** **** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * *** ** ********** She is very supportive, considerate, caring and gives a lot of attention to the smallest thing. She explains everything in detail and clears all your doubts. Cool, calm, composed even at times of emergency, Dr Teji took care of me well and gave me a lot of support when complications came up during my pregnancy. There are very few honest doctors around who would guide and help you make the best decisions when required. I have had one of the **** ****** ******* experience and would refer Dr Teji ** *** ** *** **** ************* ** *****

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
*** ****** ********* ***** *** **** ****** * ****** *** ** *** ******* The problem was being diagnosed with PCOS, and not PCOS itself - but the acceptance that I have this situation and I have to deal with it.

A lot of gynaecological problems affect the mood of the patient and it becomes imperative to take care of the emotional health of the patient too - and doctor Teji is a champion at that.

The doctor calmed me down by explaining to me that its common in today's stressful work environment and as a highly successful young individual - i must support my body deal with it - by having the right diet, exercise and mindset.

My family and friends had tried in vain to "talk me out of it" - but the doc explained it to me - as a cause and effect phenomena - discussed my routine and showed me how I could incorporate small changes to support my body. She prescribed minimalistic medication, for which I am again grateful.

I am not saying, her positivity cured me - but it did change my mindset - brought back a smile on my face and made me ready to fight for my good health.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I am really very touched with Dr Teji mam's behaviour. she always treated me like a family member. ( indeed her polite attitude solves half of the problem).  She is just like a mother figure. Understands patient fear, answers patiently even silly questions. No unnecessary tests, no unnecessary medication, .The line" doctors ARE second GOD". fits well on her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I never wrote reviews about any doc on any platforms. But Madam is super supportive starting from the day one. The best part is she is available for the patient over Whatsapp and used to guide/help through the whole process and even after discharge.
It is very difficult to find such humble and kind doctors who go an extra mile to help patients. Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have so much respect for her since the day I started seeing her for my pregnancy... No unnecessary tests, medicines, ultrasounds.. Throughout my pregnancy she was patient in listening to me and guiding me throughout for the normal delivery. She didn't once suggest for ceasearian.. Even during delivery day , she was guiding the great team throughout the labor , and helped ease my anxiety.. and finally her encouragement led to normal delivery for my baby girl. Would highly recommend her ...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I met Dr Teji dawane in my second trimester after Dr Arati's recommendation for my delivery. She is very friendly. She patiently listens to every small issue and clearly explains all the treatment options  to the couple. She is very transparent in her treatment and tries her best for normal delivery. She is always a message away to her patients. I felt safe in her hands for my delivery and child health.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was my first time visiting Dr. Teji and hence I was a bit hesitant.But I found Dr. Teji extremely polite and patient while listening to the issues .The best part I liked about her was that she explained the problem in detail and how it is caused and everything.My doubts were cleared by her to a complete extent.I would definitely recommend her to my family and friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Today me and my baby are doing well because of her quick decision. I am so grateful to her. She prefers for normal delivery. She is a very friendly person with smile on her face. She makes patient comfortable and explains very little things. I really recommend her for any gynaec related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
She is a very sweet and caring doctor. She is a very soft spoken doctor with an ever smiling face. At first she would make the patient calm down no matter what. She has a lot of patience to explain the issue and even let us know the solution in a very simple manner so that we won't get panic about it. 
I am very happy with her treatment and the way she treats patients. 
would recommend her.

tags: None
review: I have been consulting Dr.Teji for my entire pregnancy period till delivery and it has been an amazing experience. She is a very soft spoken doctor with an ever smiling face. She gives enough time to every patient and listens very carefully to understand the problem. No unnecessary test or medicine are ever given. I highly recommend Dr. Teji for any Gyno problem or pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** **** ****** * **** **** **** ** ** ***** Thank you much mam. The kind of patience she has is ultimate.  We went to her as my mom was having heavy bleeding and with no knowledge that it was fibroid due to which she had shortage of blood percent like 5% in her body. The doctor explains the problem very nicely and gave many  alternative solutions.  Best part is she is very friendly throughout and after surgery over WhatsApp.  Thanks once again mam. Now my mom is healthy and happy. I started believing doctors are form god's.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I visited Dr Teji Dawane for my wife pregnancy check up..as far as doctor is concerned she is good in explaining the issues, but i don't recommend to go to Mnaipal hospital to meet with Dr Teji, instead go to RXDX clinic in Sidhapura. Typical management ever seen in my life.you will not come to know how slowly they will be sucking your money and at last most typical is the receptionist who doesn't know how to talk with patients, my case was missed abortion in which every thing was resolved by medication process and doctor had asked us to meet with her in Manipal for a follow up visit, but management asked us to pay Rs 600 for follow up.i dont understand when there is a follow up visit why they ask for again Rs 600 to pay. Also regarding Scanning/ Ultrasound, manipal is the only one who is taking 2000/- for ultrasound in pregnancy, i recommend everyone to do Scans in some private clinic other wise you will spend minimum 15000 to 20000 in scanning during your while pregnancy..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Teji is a soft spoken, caring and well experienced doctor...she makes the patient feel so comfortable. She is a Dr. to whom if u visit all your worries and pain will vanish. That's my experience. My delivery was very smooth and normal all bcoz of her. She took very personal care. Explains everything very nicely. Check all reports properly. Very difficult to find such a loving, caring, humble doctor like Teji. I would recommend  to visit Dr. Teji who are expecting. Available whenever u need her. Replies to all ur urgent queries on WhatsApp.

tags: None
review: I was consulting Dr. Kavita kovi, but at the time of delivery she was on leave and it was really scary to trust on some other doctor at your peak time. But then Dr. Teji came in to see me, she handled everything with so much care and ease. She is really supportive and a soft spoken doctor. Both me and baby are absolutely fine. Mine was normal delivery. Dr. Teji guided me and my husband really well in the delivery room. I strongly suggest Dr. Teji.

tags: None
review: One of the most wonderful personality I have ever seen in life as a doctor.  I felt though out my pregnancy and child birth like I am meeting with a family person. My father-in-law told I felt as if she treated like a sister 😂😂😂

tags: None
review: This was my first visit to Dr. Teji and she was so friendly and polite. I loved her counselling session .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very friendly and patient. also made us understand the issue from the point of view of a layman. Additionally she didn't recommend any knee jerk invasive procedures upfront.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: This was my 2nd visit and Everytime I see her I feel positive. She explains the issue in detail and also listens very carefully. I am highly satisfied with the treatment as she never prescribes extra medication and tests.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very humble, Down to earth, Very soft spoken, clearly explains the situations , Prefers and Motivates for Normal Delivery, She was very helpful during my pregnancy and my family is thankful to her,  I  would highly recommend Dr. Teji for OBG..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** **** **** ******* She understand everything and then start the treatment. Me and my husband have full faith on her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Too good the doctor ... No unnecessary medication ... So humble and listens so carefully to everything we say and goes with Bullseye medication... I had an best awesome experience.,..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Great doc with enough experience and welcomes you always with a pleasant smile. Proper guidance. Have patience to hear you and understand you correctly. wont send u for unwanted tests but for required.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: Blessed to find Dr. Teji. Such a lovable caring doctor. She took great care of me in those difficult days. She stood with me in my full dilivery time. She listened each and every thing so carefully and treat it very well . Me and my daughter will always be thankful to her..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Visited for my second pregnancy and delivery. *** ** * **** **** ******* My second delivery was definitely a great experience under Dr Teji. she is a very positive doctor.  I had a normal delivery after having a caesarian 5 yrs ago all thanks to her. Her diagnosis is spot on. I strongly recommend her for any gynaec issues. Be rest assured that you are in safe hands.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Visited her for high risk pregnancy..she is very friendly, will give you enough time which according to me is very important.. this is the first time I m writing online review as I couldn't stop myself -  she is such a gem of a person I/my family has ever met.. if you are looking for a doctor who can look after you like your mother/sister then without any second thoughts you can visit her. with her care and affection I have a beautiful daughter now.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I went for my wife as she was the one suffering from fever, cold, cough and asthma. Doc was great in explaining us the causes. Gave a few meds and now my wife is continuing her medication. Doc was very friendly and approachable. Listened to our details calmly and then advised the medicines. Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dear all,
Dr Teji Dewani is amazing Dr. I have never seen such a wonderful Dr in my life time.
I would like to suggest , please meet for any gynaec related concern.
The way she talks to us itself our problem will resolve. She is friendly, caring , down to earth person.
Thanks u so much Dr, god bless you.
Many thanks from the bottom of my heart. I am really happy with the treatment.

tags: None

She seems good in nature, gives good  time for the queries. Overall good. 
Recommendations if you are not knowing any other doctor well.

review:
very patient Doctor. heard to all my concerns carefully and then adviced for the treatment.
would definitely recommend her

She is a very positive person. Highly recommend her!!

review: Very friendly and amicable behavior. Nice explanation, comforting. Listens attentively. Clears all the doubts.

review: she tools quick and best decision according to the situation. she is very matured doc. patient don't need to worry if visiting to her.
